'''''The Sky is Vast; The Earth...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 versions of the Commission ''[[To Measure the World!]].''

==Trivia==
* The achievement's Chinese name is a reference to the theme song {{zh|《地厚天高》|lit=Earth Thick Sky High}} of the Chinese children's science cartoon series ''{{zh|{{w|3000 Whys of Blue Cat|蓝猫淘气3000问}}}}''.
